titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Jack W. Berryman Papers 1992-2015 1992-2015
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Caleb Lyon for the Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced by CPNWS staff on 2020-03-17.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard), 2nd Edition.

did.abstract: The personal papers and notes of Dr. Jack Berryman detailing his work with the Wild Steelhead Coalition as well as research for his 2006 book "Fly Fishing Pioneers and Legends of the Northwest."

acqinfo.p: Donated to the Center for Pacific Northwest Studies by Jack W. Berryman in 2019

bioghist.p: Prominent sports historian Dr. Jack W. Berryman began teaching at the University of Washington in 1975 as a member of the Department of Medical History and Ethics. Though Berryman retired from full-time instruction in 2015, he remains with the department as a professor emeritus. Berryman has served as historian for the American College of Sports Medicine, president of the Wild Steelhead Coalition, and is author of the 2006 book "Fly Fishing Pioneers and Legends of the Northwest."

prefercite.p: Jack W. Berryman Papers, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University.

processinfo.p: Collection processed by Caleb Lyon for the Center for Pacific Northwest Studies in 2020.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content
processinfo.p: To learn more about problematic content in our collections, collection description and teaching tools (including how to provide feedback or request dialogue on this topic), see the following Statement About Potentially Harmful Language and Content

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, research materials and other papers documenting the work of sports historian Dr. Jack W. Berryman with the Wild Steelhead Coalition. Berryman is the author of "Fly Fishing Pioneers and Legends of the Northwest" (2006), a professor emeritus at University of Washington, and a former president of the Wild Steelhead Coalition. The collection consists of Berryman's personal papers regarding correspondence and research, Papers related to the Steelhead Moratorium, and information regarding the Coalition's hearings and presentations between 2003 and 2004.

userestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

controlaccess.corpname: Wild Steelhead Coalition (Kirkland, Wash.) -- History -- Sources.
